page.title: 08Local News and Events In Hoo
page.content: {BRICKEARTH.}The threat of earthworks in the fields opposite Hoo School, which belongs to Mr.Brice,is postponed .It would have created jobs,but would also have ruined the scenery, lowering the value of houses and increasing dangerous traffic.{CRASH}A white Cortina crashed when it went out of control,damaging the car's front.This happened on the 7th June,at the beginning of Main Road,the driver survived.{90th BIRTHDAY}Ada Collins has just celebrated her 90th birthday. She has 6 children,12 grand children and 27 great grand children.{TALL SHIP {RACE}The Cutty Sark Tall Ship Race will pass Upnor on it's way to Chatham Dockyards,on 26th July, where there will be a display.{GALA}Local Scouts arranged a gala day on 13th July. Majorette troupes and a judo display will be there.
